betterquesting:10.desc:8:
I did what I had to. The Twin Saplings of Freedom are living in the mortal world again.
It is up to another to nurture them and witness their growth. Another shall be a more worthy successor of Xxeus.
To be honest, I am not even sure if I would be any good at it. I am a tinkerer, an experimentalist, an engineer, definitely not a botanist.
This does not mean I will not try to take hold of the little Sacred Cinders magic I am given the ability to wield, though!
I definitely will not grow big powerful trees, but who knows, I may even be able to grow my little Sacred Cinders flowers one day. Or even empower my Tree of Life.
